description.para: href of the source for this document. Will be filled by xtlcon:directory-to-container and the xtlcon:zip-to-container pipelines.
When this document comes from disk, it holds the the relative filename against the value of the container's /*/@href-source-path.
When this document comes from a zip file, it holds the (relative) href of the file in the zip.
href of the target location for this document. Used by the xtlcon:container-to-disk and xtlcon:container-to-zip pipelines.
When writing to disk, a relative filename is made absolute against the container's /*/@href-target-path.
When writing to a zip, it must be a relative filename. This will become the path of the file in the zip file.
If present, overrides the value of the container's /*/@href-source-zip
Content (MIME) type of the document. Will be filled by xtlcon:directory-to-container and the xtlcon:zip-to-container pipelines.
If not present when writing a container, text/xml is assumed for internal documents

Serialization settings for this document, expressed as a JSON map. To allow the usual double quoted attribute values ("â€¦"), all single quotes will be converted to double quotes before JSON parsing is done.
Any other attributes are allowed, so additional processing information can be added.
Document contents (For text and JSON does not need to be XML).
